cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Macro__c.name: cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Macro__c
cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Macro__c.description: Contains the color macros that are used for themes.

cgc_sync__Color__c.description: Color code of the mobile device. This can be a color macro or an RGBA code.

cgc_sync__Description__c.description: Describes where this color code is used in the mobile device.

cgc_sync__Macro_Type__c.description: Color code of the mobile device. This can be a color macro or an RGBA code.

cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Theme__c.description: Refers to the mobile app theme.
